message.content:
cs.DL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper proposes a new design for improving the efficiency in research by utilizing artificial intelligence and machine learning. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The focus on utilizing AI and machine learning to coordinate individual research activities also suggests that cs.AI and cs.LG are likely categories. The emphasis on the structure and connections of problems solved in scientific studies could also suggest cs.IR and cs.SI as likely categories.
